VIII.iv.1.D.2.i
.
Obtaining Evidence Related to Claimed Stressors
For more information on obtaining service records, medical treatment records, and evidence of stressors, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D - Evidence Evaluation and Decisions for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section D
